---
slug: /115
title: "This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 08-05-2022
---
This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...
<!-- truncate -->
Hi everyone!
Following the successful launch of Docusaurus 2.0, I didn't have time to send out the newsletter scheduled for earlier this week ğŸ˜…
This is another special edition, on a Friday night, covering almost 3 weeks of news, and a lot has happened!

Impossible to read everything or comment ğŸ˜¬. I made the choice to be exhaustive and include all the links that seemed interesting to me, without necessarily commenting on them. I would already have to read them myself before ğŸ˜… a bit overwhelmed now.

During this month of August, I will focus on my Revue migration to ConvertKit. The next edition will be around August 20th, but it's also possible I skip it and won't send anything until early September.
Anyway, since we won't see each other for a while, at least you'll have something to read this summer ğŸ¤£

## React
[**Announcing Docusaurus 2.0**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

Docusaurus is the React framework I'm working on with Meta. We just released v2.0. Very happy with this release which has been relayed all over! ğŸ’ Thanks so much for participating and contributing to the success! ğŸ™ Useful links:

* ğŸ“œÂ [Issue #114 was dedicated to the launch](https://www.getrevue.co/profile/thisweekinreact/issues/this-week-in-react-114-official-launch-of-docusaurus-2-0-1273933?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* ğŸ¥‡Â [Product of the day on Product Hunt](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/docusaurus-2-0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)Â ğŸ¥‡ğŸ¤©
* ğŸ¨Â [deployment demo on Vercel by Lee Robinson](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1554211061284364290?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: ## ğŸ’¸ Sponsors
ğŸ’¡Â [How to sponsor this newsletter](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
[A Byte of Coding](https://abyteofcoding.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_source=twireact)
A daily newsletter with three curated technical deep-dives on all things software engineering.
[G2i: 100% Remote JavaScript Jobs](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters\&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=TWIR)

G2iÂ is the only hiring platform that puts developer health first. We connect React and React Native freelancers with great companies committed to improving developers' mental, physical, and emotional health and well-being.Â [Apply to join](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters\&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=TWIR)Â today.

Gabe Greenberg, founder of G2i, has launched a fund onÂ [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)Â to provide financial assistance for the dev community. Developer are welcome to apply and use the fund for counseling/therapy, paid time between freelance projects, loan assistance, child care services, medical visits and expenses, etc.
## React-Native
[**Pedal to the Metal**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter\&v=uvLQ5f3KDXk)

ğŸ¤¯ This video by William Candillon is my favorite! You must watch it even if it's just for the intro, and the quality of the productionğŸ‘Œ It includes the latest news of React-Native-Skia which goes into alpha, is included in Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, supports Snack, supports the web (with a Remotion starter), not to mention the perf improvements on the reconciler... In short, it moves fast and this is very exciting! It's also a nice collaboration with Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...
**Extras:**

* ğŸ“œÂ [Expo SDK 46](https://blog.expo.dev/expo-sdk-46-c2a1655f63f7?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* ğŸ“œÂ [EAS Update is now generally available](https://blog.expo.dev/eas-update-is-now-generally-available-6532d25e750?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
